page.title: 02SHIRE LODGE CEMETERY, CORBY.
page.content: Open 1956, replacing Rockingham Rd. site, for residents (& former) of Corby District. An Environmental and Health Dept. work, under the Parks Forman. Space for c.50 years' use, extending to Humber Walk (first plots were next to Rockingham Rd.), subject to cremation rate. Sections are : INTERNMENTS (a children's area too since 1958); ASHES (Rockingham Rd.), in rows A(1965-76), B(76-81), C(81-84) and D(current). Charge-hand and assistant visit to: dig(9'x3'normal, spades and shoring used) or open up graves (clay hampers digging and drainage);tend grave-borders(graves cared for by relatives) and gardens of this "lawn cemetery";check burial certificates (green for natural death, other white) keep records(entries-first 19.6.56-show name,age,date,plot). Cremations are increasing (now allowed for Catholics).
